what: Explore and Characterise Heterogeneity in Quality of Life Data
title: Explore and Characterise Heterogeneity in Quality of Life Data
text: Tools explore heterogeneity quality life data. development version heterodox package made available part process testing documenting package. questions, please contact authors. install development version software, run following commands R console:

title: Add class variable — add_class_var
text: add_class_var() Add function updates object adding data object. Specifically, function implements algorithm add class variable. Function argument ds_tb specifies object updated. function returns Dataset (tibble).

title: Add class variable — add_class_var
text: ds_tb Dataset (tibble) clusters_1L_int Clusters (integer vector length one) model_mdl Model (model) class_var_nm_1L_chr Class variable name (character vector length one), Default: 'class_int'

title: Add class variable — add_class_var
text: Dataset (tibble)

what: Add k-means clustering class variable — add_kmean_cls_var
title: Add k-means clustering class variable — add_kmean_cls_var
text: add_kmean_cls_var() Add function updates object adding data object. Specifically, function implements algorithm add k-means clustering class variable. Function argument ds_tb specifies object updated. function returns Dataset (tibble).

title: Add k-means clustering class variable — add_kmean_cls_var
code: add_kmean_cls_var(   ds_tb,   classes_1L_int,   components_1L_int,   pca_df,   kmean_var_nm_1L_chr = "kmeans_cls_int",   start_1L_int = 25L )

title: Add k-means clustering class variable — add_kmean_cls_var
text: ds_tb Dataset (tibble) classes_1L_int Classes (integer vector length one) components_1L_int Components (integer vector length one) pca_df Principal component analysis (data.frame) kmean_var_nm_1L_chr K-means clustering variable name (character vector length one), Default: 'kmeans_cls_int' start_1L_int Start (integer vector length one), Default: 25

title: Add k-means clustering class variable — add_kmean_cls_var
text: Dataset (tibble)

title: Calculate meanand Index — calculate_mean_ri
text: calculate_mean_ri() Calculate function performs numeric calculation. Specifically, function implements algorithm calculate meanand index. function returns Meanand Index (double vector).

title: Calculate meanand Index — calculate_mean_ri
code: calculate_mean_ri(   cvdn_results_ls,   ds_tb,   fold_id_nm_1L_chr = "Fold",   id_var_nm_1L_chr = "ID",   select_from_ls_1L_int = 2L,   select_from_df_int = c(1L, 4L) )

title: Calculate meanand Index — calculate_mean_ri
text: cvdn_results_ls Cross-validation results (list) ds_tb Dataset (tibble) fold_id_nm_1L_chr Fold identity name (character vector length one), Default: 'Fold' id_var_nm_1L_chr Identity variable name (character vector length one), Default: 'ID' select_from_ls_1L_int Select list (integer vector length one), Default: 2 select_from_df_int Select data.frame (integer vector), Default: c(1L, 4L)

title: Calculate meanand Index — calculate_mean_ri
text: Meanand Index (double vector)

title: Calculate singleand Index — calculate_sngl_ri
text: calculate_sngl_ri() Calculate function performs numeric calculation. Specifically, function implements algorithm calculate singleand index. function returns Rand Index (double vector).

title: Calculate singleand Index — calculate_sngl_ri
text: object j object data_tb Data (tibble)

title: Calculate singleand Index — calculate_sngl_ri
text: Rand Index (double vector)

title: Deprecated function — deprecated
text: Import deprecated function recommended lifecycle package documentation.

title: Fit mixture model — fit_mixture_mdl
text: fit_mixture_mdl() Fit function fits model specified type dataset Specifically, function implements algorithm fit mixture model. function returns Model (model).

title: Fit mixture model — fit_mixture_mdl
text: ds_tb Dataset (tibble) clusters_1L_int Clusters (integer vector length one) var_nms_chr Variable names (character vector)

title: Fit mixture model — fit_mixture_mdl
text: Model (model)

title: Fit mixture model clusters — fit_mixture_mdl_clusters
text: fit_mixture_mdl_clusters() Fit function fits model specified type dataset Specifically, function implements algorithm fit mixture model clusters. function returns Model summary (list).

title: Fit mixture model clusters — fit_mixture_mdl_clusters
text: ds_tb Dataset (tibble) nbr_clss_1L_int Number classes (integer vector length one), Default: 15 var_nms_chr Variable names (character vector)

title: Fit mixture model clusters — fit_mixture_mdl_clusters
text: Model summary (list)

what: Get fake Assessment of Quality of Life Six Dimension dataset — get_fake_aqol6d_ds
title: Get fake Assessment of Quality of Life Six Dimension dataset — get_fake_aqol6d_ds
text: get_fake_aqol6d_ds() Get function retrieves pre-existing data object memory, local file system online repository. Specifically, function implements algorithm get fake assessment quality life six dimension dataset. function returns Dataset (tibble).

title: Get fake Assessment of Quality of Life Six Dimension dataset — get_fake_aqol6d_ds
Get fake Assessment of Quality of Life Six Dimension dataset — get_fake_aqol6d_ds
text: Dataset (tibble)

title: Get number of classes — get_nbr_of_clss
text: get_nbr_of_clss() Get function retrieves pre-existing data object memory, local file system online repository. Specifically, function implements algorithm get number classes. Function argument cvdn_ds_tb specifies look required object. function returns Number classes (double vector length one).

title: Get number of classes — get_nbr_of_clss
text: cvdn_ds_tb Cross-validation dataset (tibble) clss_var_nm_1L_chr Classes variable name (character vector length one), Default: 'Classes'

title: Get number of classes — get_nbr_of_clss
text: Number classes (double vector length one)

title: Make average fit plot — make_average_fit_plt
text: make_average_fit_plt() Make function creates new R object. Specifically, function implements algorithm make average fit plot. function returns Plot (plot).

title: Make average fit plot — make_average_fit_plt
code: make_average_fit_plt(   cvdn_ds_tb,   nbr_of_clss_1L_dbl,   statistic_var_nm_1L_chr,   clss_var_nm_1L_chr = "Classes",   maximise_1L_lgl = F,   y_label_1L_chr = NA_character_ )

title: Make average fit plot — make_average_fit_plt
text: cvdn_ds_tb Cross-validation dataset (tibble) nbr_of_clss_1L_dbl Number classes (double vector length one) statistic_var_nm_1L_chr Statistic variable name (character vector length one) clss_var_nm_1L_chr Classes variable name (character vector length one), Default: 'Classes' maximise_1L_lgl Maximise (logical vector length one), Default: F y_label_1L_chr Y label (character vector length one), Default: 'NA'

title: Make average fit plot — make_average_fit_plt
text: Plot (plot)

title: Make cross-validation dataset — make_cvdn_ds
text: make_cvdn_ds() Make function creates new R object. Specifically, function implements algorithm make cross-validation dataset. function returns Cross-validation dataset (output object multiple potential types).

text: cvdn_results_ls Cross-validation results (list) select_from_ls_1L_int Select list (integer vector length one), Default: 1 select_from_df_int Select data.frame (integer vector), Default: NA fold_id_nm_1L_chr Fold identity name (character vector length one), Default: 'Fold'

title: Make cross-validation list — make_cvdn_ls
text: ds_tb Dataset (tibble) folds_int Folds (integer vector) nbr_cores_1L_int Number cores (integer vector length one), Default: 1 nbr_clss_1L_int Number classes (integer vector length one), Default: 15 var_nms_chr Variable names (character vector)

text: Cross-validation (list)
